item.title: 不喜欢投票的人应该有投票权。只是不要那么频繁。
item.description:
英国的新规划制度将削弱民选地方官员的作用，从而阻碍发展并解决英国的住房短缺问题。【原文：

Britain’s new planning regime will pare back the role of elected local officials to unblock development and fix Britain’s housing shortage.

item.title: 中国在岸市场资金流入创新高，尽管贸易问题令人担忧
item.description: 由于 DeepSeek 的技术突破和对美国例外论的疑虑帮助抵消了贸易导致的对本地资产的担忧，外商对中国在岸市场的投资在 2 月份创下历史新高。【原文：Foreign investments into China’s onshore markets rose to a record high in February as DeepSeek’s technology breakthrough and doubts over US exceptionalism helped offset trade-led concern over local assets.】

item.title: 印度监管机构批准 LG 电子上市计划
item.description: 印度市场监管机构批准了 LG 电子公司（LG Electronics Inc.【原文：India’s market regulator approved LG Electronics Inc.’s application for an initial public offering of its Indian unit, a deal that may raise $1.5 billion and be one of the biggest local listings this year.】

item.title: 经济困境引发印尼股市暴跌停牌
item.description: 由于担心经济疲软和开斋节假期前消费者支出疲软，印尼股市周二暴跌，引发交易停顿。【原文：Indonesian equities tumbled on Tuesday, triggering a trading halt, as concerns about a weakening economy and softer consumer spending ahead of the Eid holiday weighed on sentiment.】

item.title: 联邦银行首席执行官称澳大利亚可抵御贸易战风险
item.description: 澳大利亚最大的银行行长表示，尽管唐纳德-特朗普最近宣布的关税措施引发了全球股市的大幅下挫，但澳大利亚仍有能力抵御贸易战的风险。【原文：The chief of Australia’s biggest bank said the country is well placed to weather the risks of a trade war, even after Donald Trump’s whipsaw tariff announcements recently spurred a steep selloff in global equity markets.】

item.title: 高盛称日本工资需进一步提高才能实现日本央行目标
item.description: 高盛（Goldman Sachs）的经济学家认为，日本的工资在未来两年至少需要增长 3%，才能实现日本央行的可持续通胀目标。【原文：Japan’s wages need to rise by at least 3% over the next two years to achieve the Bank of Japan’s sustainable inflation target, according to economists at Goldman Sachs.】

item.title: 据称中国将审查李嘉诚的港口交易是否存在违规行为
item.description: 有迹象表明，中国政府对这家香港企业集团在美国压力下剥离巴拿马业务感到不满，熟悉内情的人士透露，中国政府已开始调查长江和记实业有限公司出售海外港口业务一事。【原文：Chinese authorities have begun looking into CK Hutchison Holdings Ltd.’s sale of its overseas port businesses, people familiar with the matter said, amid signs that Beijing is unhappy that the Hong Kong conglomerate divested its Panama operations under US pressure.】

item.title: 主要发货国天气持续恶劣，小麦涨幅扩大
item.description: 由于主要出口国的恶劣天气继续引发对全球供应可能受到打击的担忧，小麦在上一交易日触及一个月来的最高价后延续涨势。【原文：Wheat extended gains after touching the highest price in a month during the previous session, as bad weather in major exporters continues to spark concerns about a potential hit to global supplies.】

item.title: 香港领导人称李嘉诚出售港口引发社会关注
item.description: 李嘉诚计划将其公司的大部分全球港口业务出售给贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc.【原文：Li Ka-shing’s plan to sell the bulk of his company’s global ports operations to a consortium led by BlackRock Inc. is causing concern, according to Hong Kong’s leader.】

item.title: 印度股市触底尚需时日
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts, we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: Cognition AI 在朗斯代尔公司主导的交易中获得 40 亿美元估值
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，人工智能编码助手开发商 Cognition AI 公司已融资数亿美元，估值接近 40 亿美元。【原文：Cognition AI Inc., the developer of an artificial intelligence-powered coding assistant, has raised hundreds of millions of dollars at a valuation close to $4 billion, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 澳大利亚央行公布重新设计的 5 澳元纸币的原住民主题
item.description: 澳大利亚央行宣布了 5 澳元纸币的新设计，主题是原住民与国家的联系，这一决定是在 2100 多项公众提名之后做出的。【原文：Australia’s central bank has announced a new design for the A$5 note with a theme of First Nations peoples’ connection to country, in a decision that came after more than 2,100 public nominations.】

item.title: 泰国计划将游客免签停留时间缩短至 30 天
item.description: 泰国旅游和体育部长索拉翁-添通（Sorawong Thienthong）表示，泰国计划将允许外国游客无签证逗留的天数减半至 30 天，因为这个东南亚国家正在打击利用免签政策从事非法活动的游客。【原文：Thailand plans to halve the number of days it allows foreign tourists to stay without visas to 30 days as the Southeast Asian nation cracks down on travelers exploiting the waiver to engage in illegal businesses, according to Tourism and Sports Minister Sorawong Thienthong.】

item.title: 马斯克-阿利、DOGE 成员斯坦利在动荡中被选入房利美董事会
item.description: 抵押贷款巨头房利美（Fannie Mae）已将太空探索技术公司（SpaceX）和社交媒体平台 X 的网络安全工程师克里斯托弗-斯坦利（Christopher Stanley）纳入其董事会，他还参与了政府效率部的工作，这是埃隆-马斯克的盟友如何融入联邦政府的最新迹象。【原文：Mortgage giant Fannie Mae has added Christopher Stanley, a cybersecurity engineer at SpaceX and social media platform X — who is also involved with the Department of Government Efficiency — to its board of directors, the latest sign of how Elon Musk’s allies are embedding into the federal government.】

item.title: 澳大利亚养老基金因 "洗绿 "被罚 1,050 万澳元
item.description: 澳大利亚养老基金 Active Super 因在环境、社会和治理方面做出大量虚假陈述而被罚款 1050 万澳元（670 万美元），而监管机构正在推动杜绝 "洗绿 "行为。【原文：Australian pension fund Active Super has been fined A$10.5 million ($6.7 million) for making a number of misrepresentations about its environmental, social and governance credentials amid a regulator push to stamp out greenwashing.】

item.title: 俄罗斯向北极天然气买家示好，希望在美国制裁后获得新生
item.description: 在新德里郊区拥挤的会议中心一个狭窄的展台上，俄罗斯最大的能源公司之一的高管们向印度买家推销："趁现在我们的北极天然气还很便宜，赶紧买吧。【原文：From a cramped booth in a crowded conference center on New Delhi’s outskirts, executives from one of Russia’s biggest energy firms made their sales pitch to Indian buyers — take our Arctic gas now, while it’s still cheap.】

item.title: 以色列称正在对加沙的哈马斯目标发动袭击
item.description: 以色列说它对加沙的哈马斯目标发动了军事打击，此举有可能在休战期结束后引发更多战斗。【原文：Israel said it launched military strikes on Hamas targets in Gaza, a move that threatens to spark more fighting after a truce period ended.】

item.title: 美国数据加剧经济放缓担忧，黄金坚守在 3000 美元附近
item.description: 由于投资者权衡美国数据，加剧了对经济放缓的担忧，增加了贵金属的避风港吸引力，黄金维持在每盎司 3,000 美元附近。【原文：Gold held near $3,000 an ounce as investors weighed US data that fueled concerns about an economic slowdown, adding to the precious metal’s haven appeal.】

item.title: 中国企业美元债券销售额跃升至 2022 年以来最高点
item.description: 中国 6000 亿美元的企业美元债券市场正显示出复苏的迹象，因为对人工智能进步的乐观情绪和政府最近为缓解房地产危机而采取的措施有助于提振信心。【原文：China’s $600 billion corporate dollar bond market is showing signs of resurgence, as optimism over artificial intelligence advances and recent government steps to ease the property crisis help boost confidence.】

item.title: 澳大利亚财长称特朗普金属关税是自我破坏
item.description: 澳大利亚财政部长吉姆-查默斯（Jim Chalmers）表示，美国对钢铁和铝征收关税是 "自取灭亡"，澳大利亚应该得到更好的待遇，他还补充说，唐纳德-特朗普总统迄今为止征收的关税对整体经济的影响相对较小。【原文：US tariffs on steel and aluminum are “self-defeating” and Australia merits better treatment, Treasurer Jim Chalmers said, adding the overall economic impact of President Donald Trump’s levies to date would be relatively small.】

item.title: 韩华收购造船公司股份后，Austal 股票大涨
item.description: 在韩华航空航天株式会社（Hanwha Aerospace Co.【原文：Shares of Australian shipbuilder Austal Ltd. climbed after a unit of Hanwha Aerospace Co. became a substantial shareholder in the company, as the Korean defense firm aims to bolster its reach.】

item.title: 阿尔-戈尔风险投资公司获得 1.75 亿美元，Calstrs 公司和微软公司增持现金
item.description: 由阿尔-戈尔（Al Gore）的世代投资管理公司（Generation Investment Management）创办的一家企业已筹集到 1.75 亿美元，用于投资那些能够恢复因农业和森林砍伐而退化的土地的企业。【原文：A venture started by Al Gore’s Generation Investment Management has raised $175 million to invest in businesses that enable the restoration of land degraded by agriculture and deforestation.】

item.title: 贸易战改变运输路线，中国停止进口美国液化天然气
item.description: 中国已经有 40 天没有从美国进口液化天然气，这是近两年来最长的一次，因为贸易商被迫将货物转运到其他地方，以避免中国政府对这种超冷燃料征收关税。【原文：China hasn’t imported liquefied natural gas from the US for 40 days, the longest gap in almost two years, as traders are forced to divert shipments elsewhere to avoid Beijing’s tariffs on the super-chilled fuel.】

item.title: 关注中国需求和地缘政治风险，石油保持涨势
item.description: 由于中国经济前景和中东地缘政治风险仍是市场关注的焦点，石油在连续两日上涨后趋于稳定。【原文：Oil steadied after a two-day gain, with the outlook for China’s economy and geopolitical risk in the Middle East remaining in focus.】

item.title: 澳大利亚央行认为前瞻性和数据依赖性并不 "紧张
item.description: 澳大利亚央行行长助理萨拉-亨特（Sarah Hunter）表示，澳大利亚央行在考虑政策变化时，对数据依赖性的高度重视与对全球经济衰退的持续监控并不冲突。【原文：The Australian central bank’s strong focus on data dependence doesn’t conflict with its continued monitoring of global economic ructions when considering policy changes, Assistant Governor Sarah Hunter said.】

item.title: 日本贸易公司股价将因巴菲特入股而上涨
item.description: 伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司（Berkshire Hathaway Inc.【原文：Shares of Japan’s biggest trading houses are poised to rise in Tokyo after Berkshire Hathaway Inc. increased its stake.】

item.title: 小米财报发布前股价涨幅超过分析师预测
item.description: 小米公司最近的股价涨势如此强劲，以至于其价格超出了分析师的预期，在该公司准备发布财报之际，人们不禁要问，它还能涨多少。【原文：Xiaomi Corp.’s recent stock rally has been so strong that its price has surpassed analysts’ expectations, raising questions about how much further it can go as the company prepares to report earnings.】

item.title: 亚洲股市将追随华尔街反弹：市场综述
item.description: 美国数据缓解了经济衰退的担忧，中国的积极数据也表明中国第二大经济体的韧性，受此提振，亚洲股市将上涨，追随华尔街上周大幅下跌后的走势。【原文：Asian equities were set to gain, tracking Wall Street higher after its sharp drop last week, buoyed by US data that eased recession concerns and positive Chinese figures that pointed to resilience in the second-biggest economy.】

item.title: 英国与欧盟推进关于扣押被冻结俄罗斯资产的会谈
item.description: 英国和欧盟将推进关于如何扣押俄罗斯被冻结资产的谈判，以共同提高国防开支，同时寻求在结束乌克兰战争的和谈之前加大对弗拉基米尔-普京的经济压力。【原文：The UK and European Union will advance talks on how to seize frozen Russian assets to jointly boost defense spending, as they seek ways to increase economic pressure on Vladimir Putin ahead of any peace talks to end his war on Ukraine.】

item.title: Alphabet 正在洽谈以 330 亿美元收购云安全公司 Wiz
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Alphabet 公司正在洽谈以 330 亿美元的价格收购云安全公司 Wiz，重启去年夏天经过长时间谈判后被叫停的交易讨论。【原文：Alphabet Inc. is in talks to purchase the cloud security company Wiz for $33 billion, restarting deal discussions that were called off last summer after extended negotiations, according to people familiar with the matter.】
